features: Vaseline Intensive Care Aloe Soothe body lotion with Vaseline Jelly and aloe vera
Containing micro-droplets of Vaseline Jelly and aloe vera, this body cream locks in moisture to hydrate and soothe dry, irritated skin
This body lotion is clinically proven to moisturise deeply* with the first application and to keep dry skin restored for 3 weeks**
Our Intensive Care body lotion deeply heals and refreshes dry skin without feeling greasy
Use this moisturiser as part of your daily skin and body care routine – apply all over your body, particularly after exposure to sun and wind, and after showering
Vaseline cares for the skin you're born in, which is why our body lotion works deep to moisturise dry, rough, and irritated skin
description: Product Description Vaseline Intensive Care Aloe Soothe Body Lotion combines healing micro-droplets of Vaseline Jelly with aloe vera, known to calm and soothe the skin. The result is a refreshing, fast-absorbing lotion that reduces the discomfort associated with dry, irritated skin, and leaves it feeling deeply moisturised and rejuvenated. Our Intensive Care Aloe Soothe Body Lotion is clinically proven to moisturise deeply* to soothe dry skin with the first application, and to keep it restored for 3 weeks**. Our skin is the barrier between our bodies and the outside world, and the health of our skin is essential to our overall well-being. At Vaseline, we believe that healthy skin starts with deep-restoring moisture, which is why our lotion's formula works to heal and soothe dry skin. The micro-droplets of Vaseline Jelly penetrate deep down within the stratum corneum to lock in moisture and form a protective layer on your skin. This sealing barrier speeds up the skin’s natural recovery process. Apply Vaseline Intensive Care Aloe Soothe Body Lotion daily, letting its rich yet quick-absorbing formula provide intense moisturisation to your skin and leave it delicately fragranced with a fresh aloe vera scent. *based on 4-week treatment clinical study **within the stratum corneum Safety Warning Avoid eyes.
